trans-unit.source: Represents an object that identifies an item of content.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un oggetto che identifica un elemento di contenuto.

trans-unit.source: Derived from ContentLocatorBase, a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> identifies a data item through an ordered list of <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> elements.
trans-unit.target: Derivato da ContentLocatorBase, un <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>identifica un elemento di dati tramite un elenco ordinato di <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart>elementi.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>

trans-unit.source: Derived from ContentLocatorBase, a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup> identifies a data item through a set of <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> elements.
trans-unit.target: Derivato da ContentLocatorBase, un <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>identifica un elemento di dati tramite un set di <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>elementi.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable deep copy clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile della copia completa di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This Clone method creates modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Clone (metodo) Crea modificabile copie di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetti.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, Clone shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, Clone nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be `false` even if this source <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is `true.` When copying dependency properties, Clone copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy not animations or current animation values.
trans-unit.target: Clonato <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>del <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A>proprietà sarà `false` origine anche se questo <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>del <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A>proprietà `true.` durante la copia delle proprietà di dipendenza, Clone copia delle associazioni dati e dei riferimenti di risorsa (anche se non possono risolvere) ma non la copia non le animazioni né i relativi valori correnti.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un clone modificabile della copia completa di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase"> </xref>.
